english.segment1: One hope, one voice, one light we see. One body, one heart, one destiny. Joined in Your body, Joined in Your blood, Eternally, united by Your love.
english.segment2: We are joined in Your body, Joined in Your blood, Eternally united by Your love.
english.segment3: One purpose, one truth, one life to live. One promise, one faith, one life to give. Joined in Your body, Joined in Your blood, Eternally, united by Your love.
